response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and significance to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $14,500. This opportunity not only secures your investment in a high-quality asset but also saves you $500 compared to the standard retail price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further or if there's any other information you require.", "product_price": 14500}
